table_description: Detect languages of texts using Cohere AI.

columns.name: language_name
columns.description: The name of the detected language.

columns.name: language_code
columns.description: The ISO 639-1 code for the detected language.

columns.name: text
columns.description: Text from which to detect it's language.

columns.name: texts
columns.description: The texts to detect languages for, encoded as a JSON array.
